oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Premium List, Tennessee State Fair, Nashville, September 21-26, 1908
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This publication for the Third Annual Exhibition of the Tennessee State Fair cites the rules and regulations for the exhibition, hosted in Nashville, Tennessee, September 21st to 27th, 1908. The booklet is very detailed about the Tennessee State Fair Association as well as the exhibition categories. Includes a list of the Officers and Assistants; Executive Committee; Board of Directors; Departments and Superintendents; and Standing Committees. Forms part of the Tennessee State Fair Collection. 1 booklet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Fairgrounds (Nashville, Tenn.)
